title: Vaanil Vanthe Vaanmathi Song Lyrics Album Songs
stanzas: <div>Vaanil Vanthe Vaanmathi Song Lyrics Album Songs
Vaanil vantha vanmathi

kadhal penne
kadhal penne
en manadhai thirudiyaval
neethaane

nee varum munne
adi en kanne
en vazhkai verum
puthir thaane

udhavuthaan niram
nee anindha seelai
en nenjai varum
indha maalai velai

undhan may maasam
irandu poojam poojam pattu
kel paarvathi
unakkaaga indha paatu

un babu guna
enakku vendum thinam
vinai varuda
viralgal enai varuda vendum
dhinam thendral un peyarai
solli theendum
nee mattum irundhaal
enakku podhum baby

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
uyir povathu un vazhiyil
oru kadhal kavithai
konjam solladi
kanavilum ninaivilum neeyadi

maranam jananam
adhu vandhaalum
en udalai uyir vittu
sendraalum
pala gandam thaandiye
naan varuven
un nizhalin koodave
vaazhven penne

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
uyir povathu un vazhiyil
oru kadhal kavithai
konjam solladi
kanavilum ninaivilum neeyadi

vizhiyil vilundha
manadhil nulaindha
uyiril kalandha
urave

kaadhal noiyai
theerkka vaada
enthan aaruyire

kadanthu sendra
antha yaezhuk kadalai
kaeladi
en kadhalin aalaththai
koorum unnidam thaanadi

valluvanukku vaasuki
Bharathiku kannammaa
ethanai jenmam vandhaalum
sivanin shakthi neeyammaa

vaanavil naan endraal
athan vannam neeyadi
akkarai cheemaiku sendral
thaedi varuven naanadi

kaatrodu kalandhu
varum kaadhal gaanathai
kaeladi
kadhil seidhi sollum
uyir ulla varai
I love you

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
uyir povathu un vazhiyil
oru kadhal kavithai
konjam solladi

maranam jananam
adhu vandhaalum

sendraalum
pala gandam thaandiye
naan varuven
un nizhalin koodave
vaazhven penne

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
uyir povathu un vazhiyil
oru kadhal kavithai
konjam solladi
kanavilum ninaivilum neeyadi

poonguzhali un koondhalil
yaazh meettavaa anbae
kan edhire kadhal sollum
vennilavum neeye neeye

en kanmani
kadhal arundhum thaeni
kadal thaandi vittu
sendra penmani
undhan azhagu vadivu
. sidhum kanivu
nilaikkum namadhu uravu
kalaiyaadha kanavu

meendum meendum
undhann niyabagam solluthe
yaengudhu thinam
manam thannanthaniye penne.

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
en kadhali neeyadi
uyirodu seradi
en nadai udai bavanai
maatriyaval neeyadi

un kaalgal aadum
baratham nadanam
en uyirai thudikka
vaikkum un
salangai oli satham
un idhal pesum
anbaana mutham

vaanil vantha vaanmathi
uyir povathu un vazhiyil
oru kadhal kavithai
konjam solladi
kanavilum ninaivilum neeyadi

maranam jananam
adhu vandhaalum
en udalai uyir vittu
sendraalum
pala gandam thaandiye
naan varuven
un nizhalin koodave
vaazhven penne

kayal vizhiye
iru manam serum neram.
idhaya mozhiye
un pakkam veesum
en nesam
sillendra paarvai ondru
podhum
motcham theriyudhadi
penne
